Name: Ginger Cosmo
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of candied ginger on pick.
Review: Just what it says on the tin - your everyday Cosmopolitan but with extra vitality courtesy of a good whack of ginger spice.
History: The Ginger Cosmo emerged during 2002 in New York City but this recipe is adapted from one we discovered in October 2019 at Soho House Barcelona where it reigned as the best-selling "House Signature" cocktail. Cosmopolitan cocktail history and recipe variations
Nutrition: One serving of Ginger Cosmo contains 187 calories
